description: This is a Java Spring Boot REST controller class for managing grievances/tickets in an airport facility service platform. It provides endpoints to list, retrieve, create, and delete grievance records.

classes.name: GrievanceController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller managing grievance/ticket endpoints for creating, retrieving, listing, and deleting grievances related to airport services

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all grievances, optionally filtered by passengerId.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific grievance by its UUID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new grievance record.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to delete a grievance by its UUID.
